title: pelimies
author: pelimies
content: About $FUNCA long time ago, when life was easier.. more simplistic in fact, Mr. DiCaprio was acting in many blockbuster movies - yet, did we know about the amazing memes that would be made.Many of us have been unfortunate enough to miss huge gains with cryptos meme tokens such as Doge, Shiba, Floki, Pepe - and countless others. Fun Coupons have been waiting for their time to shine. That time is now.Fun Coupons is a community driven token launched on Ethereum. The cryptocurrency was created as a tribute to the many Jordan Belfort internet memes.The project aims to put their own spin on the popularity of meme coins, like Shiba Inu and Dogecoin, and strives to establish itself as one of the top community meme-based cryptocurrencies whilst also giving utility to the token. $FUNC appeals to the cryptocurrency community by instituting a no-tax policy.In Late May 2023, the team behind $FUNC embarked on a journey to create a real tribute to their favourite meme theme, and began spreading the word of their upcoming project. A presale of the token ahead of launch was held, and 150 ETH was raised in the presale round in under four minutes, with over 500 participants attempting to join the token holders.The project launched on 27th May 2023 and continues to go from strength to strength with marketing across social media.-- Contract - 0x0329a7bb7a778cbc1731a8215ca36c3a1a4d7cee-- Chart : https://www.dextools.io/app/en/ether/pair-explorer/0xd1119604c4eD05b72C74c2BC25B50bD7C37F2cbF-- Swap : https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?outputCurrency=0x0329A7bb7a778CBc1731a8215Ca36c3a1a4D7CeEüåê SOCIALS üåêWebsite : https://funcoupons.vipTwitter : http://twitter.com/FUNCethLINKTREE : https://linktr.ee/funcouponsfunc
